alert.message: High Inlet Temperature on Spectrum Scale NSD Servder
alert.name: [Spectrum Scale] NSD Server* High Inlet Temp

targets.query: select value from ipmi_sensor where "name" = 'inlet_temp' and $timeFilter and host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6]/ and $timeFilter group by host
select value from ipmi_sensor where "name" = 'exhaust_temp' and $timeFilter and host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6]/ group by host

alert.message: High CPU Temperature Alert on Spectrum Scale NSD Server
alert.name: [Spectrum Scale] NSD Server* High CPU Temp

targets.query: select value from ipmi_sensor where "name" = 'temp' and $timeFilter and host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6]/ group by host
select value from ipmi_sensor where "name" = 'pwr_consumption' and $timeFilter and host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6]/ group by host
select value from ipmi_sensor where "name" =~ /^fan.*/ and unit='rpm' and host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6]/ and $timeFilter group by host

alert.message: Input Voltage out of range on Spectrum Scale NSD Server
alert.name: [Spectrum Scale] NSD Server* Input Voltage

targets.query: select value from ipmi_sensor where "name" =~ /^voltage_.*/ and host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6]/  and $timeFilter group by host
select avail_state from mmlsdisk where $timeFilter and fs ='your_fs0_here' group by nsdname
select binary_state from services where title='multipathd' and host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6].*/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY host

alert.message: DDN-IBSRP service is not running properly on host
alert.name: [Spectrum Scale] NSD Server* DDN-IBSRP Error

targets.query: select binary_state from services where title='ddn-ibsrp' and $timeFilter GROUP BY host
select binary_state from services where title='iptables' and host =~ /your_nsd_server_regex[1-6].*/ and  $timeFilter GROUP BY host

alert.message: GPFS File System Unmounted and/or Offline
alert.name: [Spectrum Scale] NSD Server* Mount Failure

targets.query: select presence from mountcheck where host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6].*/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY host,fs
select deadlock from deadlock_detect where $timeFilter

alert.message: High Local Disk Usage on Spectrum Scale NSD Server Local Disk
alert.name: [Spectrum Scale] NSD Server* High Local Disk Use

targets.query: select used_percent from disk where $timeFilter and  host =~ /$host$/ and fstype != 'gpfs'  and fstype != 'iso9660' GROUP BY path
select used_percent from disk where $timeFilter and  host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6]/ and fstype != 'gpfs'  and fstype != 'iso9660' GROUP BY path, host
SELECT derivative("bytes_recv", 1m) FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter  group by "interface"
SELECT derivative("bytes_sent", 1m) FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter  group by "interface"
select total from processes where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select zombies from processes where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select last(uptime) from system where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/

alert.name: [Spectrum Scale] NSD Server* Network Interface Errors

targets.query: select err_in from net where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/ GROUP BY interface
select err_out from net where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/ GROUP BY interface
select err_in from net where $timeFilter and host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6]/ GROUP BY interface,host
select err_out from net where $timeFilter and host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6]/ GROUP BY interface, host
select usage_idle from cpu where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select usage_system from cpu where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select usage_user from cpu where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select usage_iowait from cpu where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select load1 from system where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select load5 from system where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select load15 from system where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select load5 from system where $timeFilter and host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6].*/ group by host
select count from waitercount where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select count from waitercount where $timeFilter and host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6]/ group by host
select length from longestwaiter where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select length from longestwaiter where $timeFilter and host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6]/ group by host

alert.name: [Spectrum Scale] IB Symbol Errors on Port

targets.query: select symbol_error from infiniband where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/ group by device
select symbol_error from infiniband where $timeFilter and host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6]/ group by host,device

alert.message: High Memory Usage on Spectrum Scale NSD Server
alert.name: [Spectrum Scale] NSD Server* High Memory Usage

targets.query: select used_percent from mem where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select available_percent from mem where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select used_percent from mem where $timeFilter and host =~ /^your_nsd_server_regex[1-6]/ group by host
select usage from daemoncpu where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select usage from daemonmem where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
